title: [Large-scale] Development of Comparative Educational Philosophy Framework: Inquiry into Mathematics Teaching Methods Through Cognitive Psychological Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A course where students compare educational philosophies and develop mathematics problem-solving strategies based on cognitive psychology principles.

learning_goals: Learners can compare and classify three or more major educational philosophies
Learners can design mathematical problem-solving strategies by applying cognitive psychological principles
Learners can revise their learning approaches based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
